bayes.classifiers package¶

bayes.classifiers.base module¶

exception bayes.classifiers.base.AlphaZeroWarning¶

Bases: exceptions.Warning

class bayes.classifiers.base.BaseNB¶

Bases: object

accuracy_score(X, y)¶
fit(X, y)¶
X
: array-like, shape (n_samples, n_features)
Training vectors, where n_samples is the number of samples and n_features is the number of features.
y
: array-like, shape (n_samples,)
Target values.
self
: ComplementNB object
Returns self.
partial_fit(X, y, classes=None)¶

Incremental fit on a batch of samples.

X
: {array-like, sparse matrix}, shape = [n_samples, n_features]
Training vectors, where n_samples is the number of samples and n_features is the number of features.
y
: array-like, shape = [n_samples]
Target values.
classes
: array-like, shape = [n_classes], optional (default=None)
List of all the classes that can possibly appear in the y vector. Must be provided at the first call to partial_fit, can be omitted in subsequent calls.
self
: object
Returns self.
predict(X)¶

Perform classification on an array of test vectors X.

X
: array-like, shape = [n_samples, n_features]
Unseen samples vector
C
: array, shape = [n_samples]
Predicted target values for X

bayes.classifiers.cnb module¶

class bayes.classifiers.cnb.ComplementNB(alpha=1.0, weight_normalized=False)¶

Bases: bayes.classifiers.base.BaseNB

Complement Naive Bayes classifier

alpha: float
Smoothing parameter
weight_normalized: bool, default False
Enable Weight-normalized Complement Naive Bayes method.

Rennie J. D. M., Shih L., Teevan J., Karger D. R. (2003). Tackling the Poor Assumptions of Naive Bayes Text Classifiers

https://people.csail.mit.edu/jrennie/papers/icml03-nb.pdf

Bases: bayes.classifiers.base.BaseNB

Smoothing parameter

Enable Weight-normalized Complement Naive Bayes method.

http://www.cs.waikato.ac.nz/~eibe/pubs/UAI_200.pdf

Bases: bayes.classifiers.base.BaseNB

Negation Naive Bayes classifier

alpha: float
Smoothing parameter

Komiya K., Sato N., Fujimoto K., Kotani Y. (2011). Negation Naive Bayes for Categorization of Product Pages on the Web

http://www.aclweb.org/anthology/R11-1083.pdf
